post:
Due to the Corona Virus and lock-downs in a lot of countries, we have decided to run a promotion on our VPS service with a **17,5% discount** _(applied at checkout)_ on top of the 50% discount already on our VPS packages.

**X1**
- 1 core
- 1 GB RAM
- 30 GB NVMe SSD
- 1 IPv4 (with rDNS)
- 1000 GB traffic
- 100 Mbps uplink (upgradable to 250, 500, 1000 Mbps)
- Free DNS hosting for 25 domains
Price: **2,47 EUR** per month (normal price: 2,99 EUR)
[Click to order](https://clients.skb-enterprise.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=105&promocode=vps-corona-discount)

**X2**
- 1 core
- 2 GB RAM
- 60 GB NVMe SSD
- 1 IPv4 (with rDNS)
- 2000 GB traffic
- 100 Mbps uplink (upgradable to 250, 500, 1000 Mbps)
- Free DNS hosting for 25 domains
Price: **3,70 EUR** per month (normal price: 4,49 EUR)
[Click to order](https://clients.skb-enterprise.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=106&promocode=vps-corona-discount)

All other plans which are above 7 USD per month cannot be posted here. [See our VPS page instead](https://skb-enterprise.com/virtual-servers).

**Additional discount (based on standard monthly price):**
Payment per 3 months: 5%
Payment per 6 months: 10%
Payment per 12 months: 15%

Datacenter: Wormer (Amsterdam metropolitan area)
Network: 64425
Virtualization Type: KVM

**Payment methods**
- PayPal
- Cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum)
- CreditCard
- Alipay
- Wechatpay
- Sofort
- Bancontact
- iDeal
For PayPal, CreditCard fees are calculated

**Why choose SKB Enterprise?**
- In business since 2013
- All VPS cores are Dedicated
- We own all hardware our customers run on
- We are RIPE LIR member with all subnets on our own ASN: 64425
- Support available all day, 365 days per year
- Monthly contracts with no cancellation in advance
- Game/Voice servers, VPN, Streaming, Adult allowed
- Realtime traffic insight, reboot, and reinstallations

**Company details**
Legal name: SKB Enterprise B.V.
Address: Kingsfordweg 151, 1043 GR, Amsterdam, NL
Sales: sales@skb-enterprise.com
Chamber of Commerce NL #: 69737770
VAT: NL857990822B01
